name: seymour_an_introduction
review: Should've died in the holocaust

name: seymour_an_introduction
review: a hymn to the transcendent via music. Wonderful. A film to see again and again.

name: seymour_an_introduction
review: The movie could have been reduced to a two minute bio to be played before Seymour receives some award no one cares about. I'm sure it's considered inspiring or heartwarming, but it was not worth making into a movie.

name: seymour_an_introduction
review: Beautiful just beautiful. Makes me love music even more. Bravo Seymour.

name: seymour_an_introduction
review: Fabulous movie. What a great view into a true artist's life. It has always been extremely fascinating to me to understand what an artist has to go through to make it where they are. This is a great vision of how much goes into being classical pianists, as well as how they view life in general.

name: seymour_an_introduction
review: Inspiring! It made me want to start training martial arts again (live my life like an art form). I think that everyone will get something out of watching this movie. A lot of introspection = great film.

name: seymour_an_introduction
review: Is more about life than music . life as told by a master. A very powerful film.

name: seymour_an_introduction
review: I want to watch it again!

name: seymour_an_introduction
review: Seymour is the kind of guy that just oozes wisdom and knowledge that one can only gain through a lifetime of achievements and despair.

name: seymour_an_introduction
review: Absolutely fantastic!! Full of deep understanding of human emotion through music- life itself as understood through music! I highly recommend this to anyone who loves music. This movie, and the man who is portrayed is a treasure Thank You Ethan Hawke!!!

name: seymour_an_introduction
review: Don't care for documentaries as a rule, but this one is stirring, heartwarming, magnificent. Don't miss it.

name: seymour_an_introduction
review: Seymour is charming. I enjoyed this look into his world and his insights on music and life.

name: seymour_an_introduction
review: A wonderful film about music, art and life! Don't miss it!

name: the_life_and_times_of_hank_greenberg
review: There is a reason that the critics loved this film. it was terrific. A great look atca wonderful player and his struggle against discrimination, before Jackie Robinson's struggle. Must see.

name: the_life_and_times_of_hank_greenberg

name: elaine_stritch_shoot_me_2013

name: elaine_stritch_shoot_me_2013

name: elaine_stritch_shoot_me_2013
review: An amazing film ~ Karasawa captures the shimmering wisdom and the murky neurosis innate to every human being. Bravo to Elaine for never giving up!!! Bravo to Elaine for exposing her humanity for all to see!!!

name: elaine_stritch_shoot_me_2013
review: A perfect movie to cap off a brilliant lady's life. It was beautiful. Very funny and very inspiring.

name: elaine_stritch_shoot_me_2013
review: Not only a retrospective on the brilliant career of an icon, it's also a poignant and often painful reflection on aging, alcoholism and the life of a performer. Elaine Stritch: Shoot Me is as brassy, ballsy and in your face as it's namesake. Everybody rise- in deed!!

name: elaine_stritch_shoot_me_2013

name: elaine_stritch_shoot_me_2013
review: I want to be Elaine when I grow up! Hahaha

name: elaine_stritch_shoot_me_2013
review: Brilliant portrayal of a true Broadway diva. Elaine at her most vulnerable: playing herself.

name: elaine_stritch_shoot_me_2013

name: elaine_stritch_shoot_me_2013

name: elaine_stritch_shoot_me_2013

name: project_nim

name: project_nim
review: This is just about as good as a documentary gets. Wonderful and heart-breaking all at the same time. I often wonder if those who abuse animals in this life regress and come back as one of the animals they abused in their next incarnation?

name: project_nim
review: a very sad tale of animal abuse... Nim really only enjoyed the love and friendship of 3 human friends and had a number of human playmates and teachers assigned him. He really shouldn't have been raised and nurtured like a human child.

name: project_nim
review: The saddest and cruelest treatment to an animal!!! Humans are so cruel to everything!

name: project_nim
review: An excellent watch. Highly recommended for anyone who has an interest in how our society affects the world around it.

name: project_nim
review: Amazing story of a chimp raised as a human and taught sign language to communicate, only to be abandoned later to live in a cage on a compound. Eventually Nim's quality of life improves, but the story remains sad. The footage of Nim's progress as a higher-intelligent chimp is fascinating.

name: project_nim
review: One of the most heart breaking docs imaginable. If you have a pulse, you'll be moved to tears.

name: project_nim
review: Touching story of a Chimp raised by Humans for research into whether they are capable of language. Along the way, We Humans let him down. Very interesting study, I shed a few tears for Nim. Great Study of Inter-Species relationships.

name: project_nim
review: Fascinating and heart-wrenching.

name: project_nim

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Great movie for those who want to understand what went on in Iraq and who was responsible.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Required viewing for politically-attentive viewers, No End in Sight delivers a worthy report and digs up a lot of dirt on the choices that resulted in the chaos of Iraq.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Absolutely amazing. What they expose is very frustrating and very hard to watch and listen to. It is a must see if you want a few answers. But just a few.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: This film is as well crafted as it is cringe-inducing and infuriating. I wish there was a little more focus on Bush's initial manipulations to get us into Iraq, but that is a very minor quibble. This is an extremely important documentary that far too few in this nation will probably see.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: One of the most important documents of our time. Gets inside and understands how the Iraq War was conducted and how it was planned (or ill-planned, I should say). Absolutely fascinating.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Such an important historical document that will great inform its audiences now and in the future. It also works as art - such a great film.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: It's getting harder to remember what it was like before.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: I just thought I knew how fucked up the Iraq War was. 7,000 years worth of artifacts from some of the earliest civilizations were burned to the ground in Iraqi museums and our soldiers had explicit orders not to stop the looting. FUCK

name: no_end_in_sight
review: This is basically a fabulous hunk of info about the war for dummies. It is insightful, its HONEST, and I for one appreciate how the angle is compassionate for humans vs anger towards the government. Besides 'The cove' this has to be my favorite documentary ever.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Ever wondered why there is still insurgency in Iraq even after 8 years, this movie answers the fundamental questions.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Aside from the US govt's dubious reasons for going to war in Iraq, the resultant behaviour displayed by Rumsfeld, Wolfewitz, Rice, Bremer et al is nothing short of idiotic. It's frightening to think that so much power is held in the hands of such ignorant, vindictive self-righteous philistines.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: All this time I thought the Iraq war was a bad idea. Now I think it could have been good if idiots hadnt been running the show. Still teary eyed from the reality

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Stunning hubris & incompetence of the postwar decisions, culminating into so much needless suffering, chaos. Film ends with my jaw on the floor and my soul filled with contempt for the war planners.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: you will be left thinking...what the fuck

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Wow, I didn't know any of this, enlightening. Possibly one of best Documentaries I've ever seen, and without doubt the best on the whole Iraq situation.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: No snark. Just facts.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Want to now exactly how the Iraq War became a clusterfuck of epic proportions? This movie will take you by the hand through the quagmire from beginning to end.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: This is the Iraq war. From start to..., well anyways. It details with candid facts the history of the war in Iraq by actual government officials who were there and involved in the whole process. We fucked up big time, and now there is no going back.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: A "disturbing documentary" that will move anyone who cares. A great look at gov't bureaucracy at its best. Tennis anyone?

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Until I saw this movie I didn't really understand just how inept and indifferent the Bush administration was about the Iraq War. That ineptness and indifference have cost a civilization its heritage and hundreds of thousands of people their lives.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: No End in Sight was very informative. To me, the overarching theme was that the United States government is not at all "one" thing. It has many heads and not every head knows what the others are doing.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: 10/10 No End in Sight removes the conspiracy-mongering ideas and interviewees and uses credible sources and informants to formulate it's argument against American incompetence with handling the war in Iraq.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Wow. This is THE best documentary on the war in Iraq I've seen yet. Very educational and, more, very saddening.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Let's you get a feel for the true reasons why the Iraq "war" was a quagmire-- They planned it to be at every step.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Hopefully there will now be an end in sight.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: It's hard to watch this and not cringe. Watching it last year would have been much worse, but at least a new administration may make this better. But most likely not.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: MUST SEE movie #2 of the year for all U.S. voters (Carrier series was the other). Reaffirms my old point that it matters less who you vote for but who you vote for will appoint. Appointed offices have scary power, as you will see.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: An absolutely incredible documentary detailing Post-War Iraq, and the gross incompetence of the Bush administration in dealing with it's occupation. The effects of which will be felt for many years to come.An absolute must see.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Fucking Brilliant!!!

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Everything Michael Moore wishes he could do in a documentary. The best I have seen, hands down.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: A truely horrific documentary that really highlights the lack of planning and thought that went into the rebuilding of Iraq after the American invasion. Ferguson coaxes some brilliant insights from thew right people and the films editing and distribution of information is a thing of beauty.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: A great documentary on the problems in Iraq and how bad decisions from a bad administration has only made it worse.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: A real eye-opener, a must see film for all humanitarians. It really makes you question the motives of those in power as well as the reasons nations have for going to war. One of the best documentary films to come by in a long time. I highly recommend it.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Infuriating and frightening. People need to see this.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: 5 Sterne = übertrieben? Ich glaube kaum.

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Quite possibly the most cohesive, well-construed documentary without being gigantic, big budget or Weinstein-affiliated production...

name: no_end_in_sight
review: Truth shall set us free!

name: no_end_in_sight
review: This movie is scary. You would think that of all the things that require careful planning, the rebuilding of country would get top priority. What you see in this movie is one of the biggest clusterfucks ever made. See it for the information.

name: no_end_in_sight

review: Really good movie. Unbelievable true story.

name: tower_2016
review: Although it is hard to watch due to the content - this film is absolutely amazing. Not only do they show actual victims and people involved in the scene, but they show real-time animations that make it seem like you are at the shooting and it just takes your breath away.

name: tower_2016
review: Uniquely done movie and well told.

name: tower_2016

Tragic events of history should be documented using Tower as its inspiration as it only glances at the life of the murderer and puts the attention on the victims and 'heros.' This is a must watch documentary.

name: tower_2016
review: One of the best documentaries I've ever seen. An event filled with stories of bravery, love, and admitted cowardice. This film beautifully recounts terrible events that unfolded over 50 years ago.

name: tower_2016
review: It's amazing how much human emotion animated characters based on actual people can convey.

name: tower_2016
review: Mixing unique animation with interviews of the victims, and footage of the event, Tower is one of the best, and most unique documentaries I've ever seen. It's a film that shows the very worst of human behavior, but also the best of it as well.

name: tower_2016
review: Really different with part animation, part actors and part real people from the happening that day. Very moving.

name: tower_2016

name: tower_2016
review: Powerful documentary. With the rotoscoping animation along with the interviews of those who fully encountered the event, as well as actual footage of the event; it all blends together in a powerful way. Masterfully edited. Highly recommend this powerful film!

name: tower_2016
review: A great way to make a movie about a tragic event. I loved the animation style and the mixture of actual footage/photography with the animation. Great storytelling style. Emotionally powerful and just great.

name: tower_2016

name: tower_2016

name: tower_2016

name: tower_2016

name: tower_2016

review: I am well versed on current events in Darfur and the attrocities being committed there, but I was faced with graphic interviews by the victims, and images. It is devistating. I am focused on finding a way to help. The world is non-complacent until it reaches our doorstep.

name: devil_came_on_horseback
review: why aren't troops in darfur!?

name: devil_came_on_horseback
review: absolutely brilliant and crucial film.

name: devil_came_on_horseback
review: absolutely stunning film...it really makes you get out of your seat at the end and want to do something about Darfur's situation, it is really appauling people on this earth can do that.

name: devil_came_on_horseback
review: absolutely stunning film...it really makes you get out of your seat at the end and want to do something about Darfur's situation, it is really appauling people on this earth can do that.

name: devil_came_on_horseback
review: Strong images showing the current situation in Sudan, and the lack of action to prevent the genocide going on. Watch it and spread the word.

name: devil_came_on_horseback
review: Instead of creating chaos and death in Iraq we could be saving lives in Sudan. Why do American people not care about educating themselves about the world and acting to prevent and resolve atrocities like Darfur and Rwanda? Great movie!

name: devil_came_on_horseback
review: One of the most powerful documentaries I have seen in years. Some of the footage is disturbing, to say the least, but this film is a must see for every American. Hopefully this film will spur people into action.

name: devil_came_on_horseback
review: Harrowing. Essential. You should gather your family (teens and grownups), your friends, your church, your students... and watch this film. Discuss it. Take it to heart. 2007 is unlikely to see a more urgent and vital project.

name: devil_came_on_horseback
review: this is an intense film. It is a documentary, so it takes the room to explore different ways of showing the story. Worth a look. Out on DVD on Nov 6.

name: devil_came_on_horseback
review: my god this movie made me open my eyes to what was happening at this very moment. What the government does its people is sick. This movie is a very well made documentry. I am inspired to help those in need ecsepcially what is happnening now in sudan.

name: devil_came_on_horseback
review: I had no idea, everybody should see this.

name: devil_came_on_horseback

name: devil_came_on_horseback

name: devil_came_on_horseback

name: devil_came_on_horseback

review: I give this a 96/A+.

review: Should be a must see for every American. Even if you're turned off by some of Michael Moore's views, go watch this anyway.

name: sicko
review: More relevant now, than ever before. Heartbreaking.

name: sicko
review: If there was a chance I would give 10 stars not just 5! This documentary is by far the best of Moore. That guy is really crazy.

name: sicko
review: this is why I vote democratic, very powerful documentary

name: sicko
review: this is a great documental

name: let_the_fire_burn_2013
review: Fuck the Philadelphia Police. Solidarity with MOVE.

name: let_the_fire_burn_2013
review: Great documentry. A must see

name: let_the_fire_burn_2013
review: Tragically fascinating.

name: let_the_fire_burn_2013
review: I have been waiting to see this film for a few months, and it was well worth the wait. It's a must-see for Documentary lovers and currently on Netflix. An easy five stars.

name: let_the_fire_burn_2013
review: The best movie of 2013.

name: let_the_fire_burn_2013
review: Outstanding documentary! This was before my time, and I hate to say I did not know this occurred. Very toching, and hard to belive all this took place.

name: let_the_fire_burn_2013
review: Easily one of the best documentaries I've ever seen. And depressing. Oh boy, was it depressing.

name: let_the_fire_burn_2013
review: Riveting - even more exciting than a Hollywood blockbuster. This is an expertly put together doc about an important, yet little heard about, moment in history.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Essential life lessons

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Great movie particularly when McNamara admits his strategy for the was was wrong. It only took 35+ years to admit they were wrong. I would imagine the immolation of Norman Morrison must have haunted McNamara for years. I hope Secretary McNamara is now finally at peace.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Revealing truth of being in the front line of war being a human.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: An extremely informative and interesting history lesson that is more than just a history lesson. Another powerful Errol Morris masterwork!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Should be required viewing in history class.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: What an interesting little documentary this is.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Inspired to watch this by our series The Sixties. Really compelling. Can't believe I haven't watched it before.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: An incredibly honest look back on the life of a man who, at his time, was probably one of the most influential people in the world. This documentary should be mandatory for anyone in a place of power. An absolute masterpiece.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Greatest documentary film about war there is. In war there are no good and bad guys. Just people who disagree with each other.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Absolutely fascinating.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: This is one of those great documentaries I watch when I iron. Every child of the cold war, and their children, too, should see this.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Amazing insight into the Vietnam war excellent documentary.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Um dos melhores documentários já concebidos.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Just incredible insight. An amazing retrospective of key decisions that have shaped politics and culture in the U.S.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: This documentary is a mind-blowingly insightful look into cold and detached analysis of the former US Secretary of Defense.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Powerful! Enlightening!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Great film! Anyone interested in 20th century history should hear the accounts from inside the "war room" from a significant player. McNamara covers topics from WWII bombing campaigns to Cuban Missile Crisis to Vietnam. Love him or hate him, he keeps you listening.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the most important chronicles of the events of the Cold War. A must see for all citizens not content with what they read in the newspapers.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of my all-time favorite docs.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Brilliant dissection of my all time hero

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Brilliant, mesmerizing, profound - yet it leaves you with more questions than answers. Documentary film-making at its very finest.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Every man should watch this philosophically rich feature.McNamara's resume: President Ford Corp., US Defense Secretary, World Bank President...and much more. Talk about greatness.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Everyone should see this film. Sadly, it's the truth. Watch this, and tell me you still support any war - I dare you.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: A very well made documentary. Highly recommended

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: First saw this in my A.P. United States History Class, an excellent first hand account from Secretary of Defense Robert S. McNamara regarding his life in the politics of War.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the best doc's I've ever seen.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Wow! A super-intense history lesson delivered by Robert S. McNamara as he looks back over his incredible life and times. Knowledge and planning only go so far in the efforts to prevent history repeating itself. Interesting to hear the thought processes and how close to the brink we came.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of my favorite documentaries.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Errol Morris' best documentary. You can watch it for free on Google Video. I can't recommend it enough. It teaches some powerful life lessons, and really pulls you in through Morris' innovative interviewing equipment and technique. He's a master of his craft.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: A very good documentary and lesson in history.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Gladiator: for adults

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: The best documentary I've ever seen. Amazing concept and execution. So scary to think this really happened.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the best documentaries I've seen and the score is masterfully done by Phillip Glass.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Im one of the few people that actually like Robert McNamara. This is a great biographical movie.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: This is my favorite documentary I have seen. Mr. McNamara does an amazing job or telling his story and the lessons he tells you are lessons you can apply to any situation.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: It is impossible to watch this film and not learn something.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: far scarier than a horror movie. but still brilliant.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of my favorite movies ever.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Brilliant - a lifetime resumee of Robert McNamara, former Secretary of Defense during the Vietmam war.And he has to tell a lot of things...

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: The best thing about learning history is finding out how wrong you were before.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Meglamaniacs in pressure cooker situations with too much responsibility. Fascinating & disturbing. Documentaries don't get better than this.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: There's no such a thing as a guilty free country!!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of those movies everyone should see at some point.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the most depressing and amazing movies I have ever seen.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: An excellent and thought-provoking look inside the aged (and wiser) mind of the (recently) late Robert McNamara.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the best docs ever.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Maybe the most important interview ever put on film, around which Errol Morris has constructed, more or less, the story of war in the 20th century.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Very good documentary. A fascinating look at a piece of American history.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Robert S. McNamara was a great leader of our time and was shown in a very subtle and global storytelling. Every words of it is priceless and must cost the greatest director, Errol Morris

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Uno de los mejores documentales que he visto.Excelente.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Favorite documentary of all time.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of my favorites! It really changed my mind about a lot of things, primarily, my opinion of this man.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Sharp and challenging documentary which extracts many valuable lessons learned from the life of a complex, brilliant, compromised public figure.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: The best documentary that I have ever seen, and would ever hope to see. A lot of lessons can be taught from the life of Robert McNamara and the way that it is all presented here is amazing.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: A real gem of a documentary film. McNamara's Eleven Lessons should be thoroughly studied by every modern-day politician. And yes, proportionality should be a guideline in war.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: An important historical document, basically.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Remember when documentaries weren't self-serving polemics? The producers of The Fog of War do.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: This is a documentary masterpiece. To humanize one of the more hated men in American history is no small feat, but is insignificant compared to the story of the human in it. McNamara is a fascinating riddle which, though the film does not solve, is worth puzzling through over and over again.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Mandatory viewing for anyone voting.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: I just re-watched this flick on my iPod Touch. This continues to be a fascinating and powerful film. A great discussion starter about many a complex topic.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the most important films ever made, in my humble opinion. The chance to interview someone who has been so integral in the world's recent conflicts comes along once in a lifetime. I think it should be required material for every kid in the country.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Hella Good! insightful, interesting, disturbing, and very well done. Good music from Glass too!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: A lot of questions about war and responsibility.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: creepy, the mathematics of death.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: very.... very.... very.... boring

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: this should be required viewing before anyone is allowed to speak at parties about US politics.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: I watched this movie because my wife wanted to see it. EXCELLENT!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: More than a history lesson -- it is a first-hand account of the inherent inadequacies of human nature and the conspicuous fallibility of those we trust with the most destructive power on Earth.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Errol Morris is my favourite documentarian of all time, period

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Anyone who misses this documentary is missing the views of one of the most influential people of the 20th century.  Thats all there is to it.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: This movie should be required viewing for the next president.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the best documentaries I have ever seen. McNamara is spellbinding, and Morris interviews him with consummate subtlety.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: a great documentary- interesting and moving

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Extremely informative and entertaining - true history - well suited for University Level discussions

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: LESSON #9: IN ORDER TO DO GOOD, YOU MAY HAVE TO ENGAGE IN EVIL."How much evil must we do in order to do good? We have certain ideals, certain responsibilities. Recognize that at times you will have to engage in evil, but minimize it."

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Absolutt mest interessante, fengslende, skremmende og lærerike doku om storpolitikkens absurde logikk- under den kaldeste perioden hvor tilfeldigheter forhindret total atomkrig. Unike innblikk og betraktninger fra et unikt menneske i en "enkel", men effektiv form.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Amazing. It is very rare that someone so high-profile is so open about mistakes they've made. Mr McNamara uses the mistakes from the past to illustrate important "lessons in war" from the importance of empathising with the enemy to the flawed nature of intelligence.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Chilling, eye opening and fascinating. Robert McNamara is a mesmerizing presence while he gives his "lessons from life" that offer an enlightening if sometimes disheartening vision of the last century and the frailty and fallibility of those in positions of power.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: The Fog of War is a haunting and fascinating descent into one man's soul and the mistakes that define his life. The larger themes and implications of the film are disturbing, as Morris paints a dark and absurd portrait of human nature and the senseless chaos of war.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Absolutely excellent.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of my favorite movies of all time.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Incredibile--saw this w/ a friend, and when the film had audio of LBJ discussing Vietnam, we looked at each other and our jaws dropped; it could just as easily have been "W" talking about Iraq.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: A perfect study of someone who I probably disagree with on all points but still find sympathetic. I need to watch this again to take it all in.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Brilliant! Compulsory viewing. Extraordinarily compelling and eerie in the light of the current Administration's devastating foreign policy, the full and lasting ramifications of which are yet still to be realized.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Most well-made documentary I've ever seen. Phenomenal music, great cinematography, really a work of art.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Great Documentary...One of the best all time.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the best films I have ever seen. This should be mandatory watching for kids in high school. How often does someone who's entire life has been about war reflect back on it with stark honesty? Incredible.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Errol Morris' perfected documentary filmmaking style was used to good effect here with amazing restraint, given that the Vietnam-era subject was (and still is) contemporaneous with the conflicts in Iraq.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: A stunning and subjective record of how politics are formed and decisions are made, and how a brave man indeed makes his peace with his conscience

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: this is the best Documentary i have ever seen.in addition to being educational it is also very entertaining.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: A very good documentary that examines one of the most controversial people in history.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Not as funny as I had hoped.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Absolutely Shocking! All I can say is that it takes great character by McNamara to admit what he admitted in this movie. I felt sympathy for him, but at the same time felt hatred. Documentaries don't get ANY better than this one. I was transfixed and amazed.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Vietnam War's architect in the confessional, trying to save his legacy. Haunting. Scariest movie of the decade.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: one of the best documentaries ever. Robert S. McNamara has lived one amazing life.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: should be played to civics classes in school

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Excellent documentary. In a fascinating balancing act, McNamera simultaneously bares his soul while and at the same time demonstrates denial over his responsibility for the horror he helped create.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: one of the best docs ever made. Morris turns the camera on a pivitol figure in American politics and the results are frightening, riveting, and enlightening. Also featuring a great score by Philip Glass.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Excellent film about decision making. I have watched this film probably 10 times this year.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: i am learning my lessons as well!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: i heard great things about this documentary - but i just couldn't sit through it!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the finest documentaries ever made. Rich and complex and extraordinarily well executed.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the most riveting docs I've ever seen. Highly, highly suggested.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: informative documentary, but if you're into interested in history or politics you shouldn't bother.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the most engrossing documentaries I have ever seen. A gripping 90 minutes with an iconic and influential figure from the 20th century.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Interesting and thought provoking.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Best documentary I've seen since Shadow Company

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Everything I know about war I learned from Robert McNamara... not really, but Morris does his best to get me the fuck interested from a guy who knows.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Fantastic documentary - almost a reflection on one mans amazing - if controversial life... A brave look at how he took decisions and their effect looking through the graced benefit of hindsight- Errol Morris just keeps the pace buzzing with amazing editing

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Possibly one of the most important documentaries made in recent years.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Absolutely spectacular. If you have not seen this movie, you definitely should. It is one of the most powerful films I have ever seen. Kinda looks boring, but place your faith in Errol Morris

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: one of the best, if not the best , documentary i've ever seen

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Not often that a documentary should be regarded as a true historical document. The tension between what McNamara wants to say but can't and the filmaker's desire to portray the honesty of the man is a remmarkable achievement

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the finest documentaries of the past decade. this Errol Morris opus concerns the life of American defense secretary Robert McNamara.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Simply superb. One of Morris' best.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: macnamara admits the gulf of tonkin "event" was a fraud...

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Perhaps the best documentary ever made. An emotional interview laced with archival footage, statistics and a Philip Glass score.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: The Best Documentary of all time

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Best Documentary EVER.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Very candid and honest

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Some movies are beautiful. Some are important. This one is both. No one can credibly speak about Vietnam, especially in the Iraq War context, without an understanding of Robert McNamara. By far one of the ten most important movies I have ever seen.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: McNamara opens a door on another side of US history- one we know about, but hearing the details in such a frank discussion is chilling & deeply moving. This is such an important film... I don't expect President Bush has seen it.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: The best documentary on U.S. Foreign Policy ever made. Every American should watch this film.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: If there is a movie that should be required viewing for any student, this is it.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: The best documentary and most important film I've ever seen. Go see it ASAP if you haven't already

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Eleven Lessons learned 1. Learn from the past 2. if you work for the government it's very hard not to suck balls. 3. sacrifice sheep 4-11. mcnamara was kinda cool. if what he says is true. Oh come on. errol morris is digging, ohhhhoho boy he's digging!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: This movie revealed to me what I already knew; that the American History I've learned all my life is bullshit. We've done as many terrible things as any other country. Every American should see this movie and rethink their worldview.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Mandatory viewing. Period.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Hats off to Robert McNamara for appearing in this movie. I think he had a lot to get off his chest.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Tremendous and brilliant documentary. This movie gives you a taste of the reality to what led to Vietnam and the total bs that occurs behind closed doors.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Brilliant documentary! Robert McNamara is as honest as he is ruthless about how countries should, and did, act in war. It is amazing to see how emotionally attached he still is to the actions of his past.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: the best documentary I have ever seen. brutally honest, not really politicized like alot of them and very insightful. he talks about his flaws and doesnt really apologize for them...he is my new hero!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara

review: Major. This documentary is fascinating.

Unfortunately the pitfalls and dangers warned of in this movie have not been avoided. History is repeating itself once again.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Brilliantly conducted. Some humour mixed with sense of tragedy. Humanises McNamara as another creature walking this Earth.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: If only this had come out before the invasion of Iraq and more people had seen it. A great illustration of how "experts" can get it wrong.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Amazing movies, my favorite documentary! It will definitely make you rethink your views on war.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: McNamara is an incredibly engaging subject, and has many pertinent things to say. Well worth watching.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Robert S. McNamara is one of the smartest men to ever assist in leading this country. i am so greatful he made this documentary to show the world his own mistakes and what we should do in the future. one of my favorite documentaries. everyone should see this.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the most riveting documentaries I've ever seen. When McNamara speaks, we should listen. An excellent musical score only adds to the documentary as a whole.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Rarely do we get to hear such in-depth reflection from a controversial public figure like this. You may, of course, not exactly agree with his analysis of events ...

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of my favorite documentaries

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Another Morris gem ... McNamara's brillance and ego are jarring. What is overwhelming to the viewer is trying to ascertain whether these two attributes were primary causes or pacificers in the Vietnam escalation

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: scared me more than any horror movie ever could. are leaders sometimes are just as blind as we.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Totally interesting. Loved every second of it.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Incredibley pertinent.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: really, really good.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Definitely a movie I need to watch again since it's been a while

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: this film demonstrates why errol morris is the best documentary filmer. the editing was amazing too.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: a must see documentary on a commonly maligned american figure. his account in his involvement in the wars of mid 20th century was humble and sobering.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Very important and thought-provoking look at a man involved in some of the 20 century's greatest moments - good and bad. Utterly fascinating and valuable viewing.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Another classic documentary from Errol Morris; if you care about American history in the 20th century, this guy, Robert McNamara, lived it.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: If you have to watch anything about war, this is the movie to watch. This is a sincere and honest look at a life in politics and war. It is truly enlightening, you should watch this more than a few times.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: I love documentaries. This one is.... I don't know what to say. It's going to be with me for a while.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: This documentary is one of my all-time favorite movies. Shows how incredibly complex and full of contradictions we all are, especially those that hold public office.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Fantastic illustration of the complexities of Vietnam and the complex character of people like McNamara. The amazing thing is that you feel empathetic towards him despite all the things wrong with him.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: This is my favorite documentary of all time. Even in his 80s McNamara is more captivating than any politician working today. Understanding his point of view is essential to understanding the events that surrounded him... oh and modern global conflict.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the most interesting movies I have ever seen. I highly recommend it to anyone with a brain.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Incredible. Unbelievably candid look at JFK and LBJ's SoD, McNamara, who happened to be the SoD during Vietnam. Most interestingly, Mac is as intense as a 90 year old as he was in the 1960s.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: OUTSTANDING!!!! One of the greatest documentaries you will ever see and an inside look of where the 20th Century went right and where it went terribly, terribly wrong.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: I've only watched a few documentaries in the theater, and this was the only one so far that I've WANTED to watch in one. I agree, a definite stunner of a film.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: I agree with Neil ... this was one of the most stunning documentaries I have ever seen ... not so much to learn something new as to see the psychology of a man who does these things.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Stunning and chilling documentary. McNamara's revelations of his ignorance when meeting his opponents some 30 years later are sobering and frightening.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: A fascinating glimpse into the brilliant, conflicted and conflicting mind of Robert McNamara.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Truly eye opening especially when he compares the size and casualty count of firebombed Japanese cities to their US counterparts.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Very very moving & interesting - to see the honest, human side of McNamara (Secretary of Defense under LBJ). He described himself at one point as a war criminal. the film describes the 20th century through his eyes. very good score by Phillip Glass. `Chilling` is a good word for it.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Robert McNamara blew my mind. He has more great quotes than any great thinker i know of. A reflected man indeed.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: A chilling documentary. You can appreciate this whether you like Mr. McNamara or you hate him. Either way, he is a very intelligent, thoughtful, regretful man who knows he has a lot of blood on his hands, and he sort of wears that sorrow and regret on his sleeve.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Excellent! I loved it.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Top documentary. Dont miss it.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: This is how you make a documentary.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Phenomenal. I make a point to watch this every few months or so, and find new parallels to our current situation each time. McNamara's guilt and delusions are palpable. As close to flawless a doc as you'll get, and IMHO, Morris's best.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: You can have Michael Moore driving around Washington D.C. in an Ice-cream truck reciting the Patriot Act, but give me The Fog of War. An important Documentary that everyone who cares about U.S. foriegn plicy should feel obligated to see.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: A must for anyone who has ever asked themself "why do we go to war?"

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Probably one of the most thought provoking documentary histories of the second half of the 20th century.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Important messages- and like all political truths gets everyone extremely irritated.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Hind sight is always 20/20. Robert McNamara explains his lessons from his time as Secretary of Defense from 1961-1968.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Very interesting, a period of history I studied and researched and this is excellent material. Se it!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: The best documentary I have ever seen. I wish more people would watch this.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: This is, hands down, one of the most important movies ever made. I have watched this about eight different times and I can't take my eyes off the screen every time I start playing it.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: McNamara is brutally honest and by the end of the doc you can see the 400 pound gorilla finally climb off his back.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: An absolutely GREAT movie!!!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: fuck you Robert S. McNamara. You ruined a part of my life you taint munching scrotum face. i fell asleep in class because of you.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: If you are at all interested in war/history you will love this documentary. McNamara, one of the most controversial Secretaries of Defense in U.S. history, gives 11 lessons that he learned from his life of politics that apply to war and life.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Visually interesting, engrossing content. McNamara is so intelligent, well spoken and seemingly compassionate that by the end the viewer knows better than to love him but can't help but feel fascinated with this man.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Errol Morris rocks, along with the former secretary of defense. Incredible storyteller, with one person who made history. Morris is constantly reinvently documentary modes, and he does it again, with breathtaking elegance and brevity.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Eminently re-watchable and required viewing for those going into politics.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: An important film that chronicles a pivotal time through the eyes of a very misunderstood man.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Endlessly revealing and maddeningly cryptic, this is a stunning documentary. Good enough to own, and watch again.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of my favorites.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: That guy is a genius.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Errol Morris is quickly becoming my favorite documentary film maker. This film is absolutely essential if you are interested in issues of foreign relations or war.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Scary! Robert McNamara adds unbelieveable insight into some of the actions of the USA in the Cold War era. The decision making process behind firebombing Japan is scary. Fabulous movie!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Very good lessons to be learned. This is one of my favorite documentaries ever made.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: interesting documentary bout d cold war

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: The best documentary I've ever seen.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Amazing, captivating documentary. McNamara is a really fascinating guy, among many uglier things.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Incredible. Simply incredible. I recommend it to everyone.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Probablly my faveourite documentary of all time. It works on so many levels: Historical, personal regret, human cost of war...etc. A must see for anyone interested in what is going on in the world around them.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Technically superb, somewhat ambiguous and definitely haunting. It could make you look on the world and on history through a different perspective. I could easily see Colin Powell or Condi Rice doing a similar documentary 20-30 years from now.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: The best political documentary I've ever seen, incredible insight!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Errol Morris' conversation with Robert McNamara elucidates the American political war machine and reminds us of the humanity of those in power. What is said here is quite applicable to events going on today.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Amazingly interesting and extremely concerning when you realize how close these nations came to nuclear war...a must see for anyone concerned about what is happening around us today..McNamara is unbelievable

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Unbelievable documentary. Great lessons that seem to have been ignored by present policy makers.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: This is my favorite documentery.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Great documentary about the military industrial complex

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: This guy is evil, but the movie is real fun to watch!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: unbelieavable. incredibly well done, insightful. must-see. Documentary genius.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: My first experience of the Documentary genius of Errol Morris. This film was an epic piece of non-fiction storytelling outlining Robert McNamara as both saint and sinner in equal doses by provoking both sympathy and disgust. Exellent.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Incredible. This tops Farenheit 9/11 anyday. It's jaw dropping stuff. And if this doesnt get you off the sofa and into politics, nothing will.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: My first experience of the Documentary genius of Errol Morris. This film was an epic piece of non-fiction storytelling outlining Robert McNamara as both saint and sinner in equal doses by provoking both sympathy and disgust. Exellent.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: A masterpiece. The best film of 2003.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Eye-opening and surprisingly candid.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: What a great documentary. Told by former "war-monger" of the White House, Mr. McNamara lays it all out on the table regarding the Vietnam war and war itself. I highly recommend this film!

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: There are so many wonderful Erol Morris documentaries. Mr Death is excellent as well, but there is something breathtaking about the interview with McNamara.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Es muy buen documental, trata de la guerra de Vietnan, es algo controversial por que trata sobre un punto de vista pero se adhiere a la realidad. Ademas vemos las politicas que tiene el mundo y como la llevan a cabo. Y todo esto pasa todavia en pleno siglo 21.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Everyone should see this movie. One of the best documentaries I've ever seen. Eleven lessons which will be valid for the rest of time. And with music by Philip Glass, you can't go wrong.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: The eleven lessons that are shown on this movie are really somethings to think about, about how they could play apart in your life or if you would consider that they would even apply to politics/ians today... if you would even want to enter into that life style.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Un brillante documental ganador del oscar. De los mejores documentales que he visto.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Robert S. McNamara was great in this... the music was haunting... the stories everything... everything about it blew me away

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Incredible. Apparently we have learned nothing from the lessons of Vietnam.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Excellent! That Oscar was well deserved...

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: OUTSTANDING Documentary. If you are a student of war or American politics, this is well worth the viewing.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: I'm a history junky and my favorite topic is Vietnam... great documentary on it.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: love you errol morris

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the best docs ever.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One would think this is boring... But this movie documentary is very interesting.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Fantastic documentary, in which Robert McNamara discusses his life, his role in World War 2 and Vietnam, and ultimately contemplates the nature of war itself and the reasons countries fight. Engaging and insightful. A must-see for anyone interested in 20th century warfare.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: get learned on some hidden knowledge

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: Everyone needs to watch this once.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: very informative. disturbing to be confronted with the fact that political leaders are very human and very capable of screwing everything up.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: One of the most interesting movies I've ever seen. Asks and answers many important questions.

name: the_fog_of_war_eleven_lessons_from_the_life_of_robert_s_mcnamara
review: When I see Robert McNamera in this film, I think "that's who I want to be when I grow up."

name: the_look_of_silence
review: a documentary film based on indonesia genocide 1965.

name: the_look_of_silence
review: An emotional catharsis,how low can humans beings go. Terrifying because not only the actions,but the total lack of empathy shown by the mass murderers to the family of those they killed. A wake up call to humanity..

name: the_look_of_silence
review: There are no words that does this not its predecessor justice. Just watch it.

name: the_look_of_silence
review: Beautifully sad and visually stunning, and a perfect compliment to the Act of Killing.

name: the_look_of_silence
review: This better win the Best Documentary Oscar.

name: the_look_of_silence
review: Shockingly compelling stuff.

name: the_look_of_silence
review: The banality of evil - of evil acts committed by those still in power

name: the_look_of_silence
review: An important film for Indonesians to watch.Too important too miss.

name: the_look_of_silence
review: Ok I guess see it in a few years and you'll enjoy it again

name: the_look_of_silence
review: Deeply unsettling and powerful.

name: the_look_of_silence
review: A subtle, penetrating and frequently horrifying documentary which more than matches up to its companion film "The Act of Killing".

name: the_look_of_silence
review: I wish I'd never seen this film. Yes, it's that heavy, that powerful, that wrenching...that extraordinary.

name: the_look_of_silence
review: Companion piece to the act of killing. Less trippy and more grounded than the earlier film but ultimately just as affecting. This film will linger on for a long time

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: Bowling for Columbine is not only a great documentary, but a great piece of economic filmmaking: 2 hours long but carefully constructed, works only as a whole and man what a powerful, emotional roller coaster the whole is.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: Must watch!! very thought provoking.. asks some very important questions !

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: It is, of course, a propaganda piece, but it is still funny, powerful, and interesting. Moore's personality lights up the film.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: Bowling for Columbine is a Thought Provoking, Important and Eye-Opening Documentary with witty sarcasm and raising interesting arguments by Michael Moore's informative and entertaining direction. It is a Must See.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: I've seen this movie before, but I wouldn't mind watching it again as Michael Moore really gets down to the nitty gritty about what happened and why about the Columbine massacre.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: As satirically comedic as it is powerful, Bowling for Columbine sheds light onto dark subject matters and proves what Americans are unfortunately capable of with the access of guns and fear.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: Exactly what you expected from Moore.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: Manipulative, deceiving, and biased, Michael Moore demonstrates his ability to make effective liberal propaganda that ironically goes against what liberalism is about.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: Michael Moore is a pretentious toad - one who's approach to the issue of gun control felt so contrived that I lost respect for him almost immediately.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: This is not a documentary. This is a trashy opinion piece.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: As a perfect as a documentary gets

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: This now documentary classic is a thought-provoking, lively, and incredibly well-constructed film that Michael Moore controversially but oh so perfectly layers with pitch black comedy. In ten years time, we're going to be thanking Mr Moore for this gem.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: Gotta respect Canada and Michael Moore

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: a graphic and dark, but interesting and thought brewing documentary

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: funny, provocative, and often shocking in Moore's devotion as a filmmaker.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: one of the best docs I've seen recently

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: Wow the opening seen just blows your mind, on how easy it is to get a weapon !!!! Don't miss this one

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: A story that desperately needed to be told - just not by this asshole! If you want to see Michael Moore stalk and bully a 78 year old man in the early stages of Alzheimer's disease, this is the movie for you.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: The one movie where Michael Moore isn't being a little annoying and is actually is talking about a problem that we can change. Instead of things that wont.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: Well worth everyone's time to see.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: Michael Moore fez o filme que os EUA (e o mundo) precisavam.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: Manipulative film making at its worst/best. This documentary sparked my interest in the world outside of my home, and each year I use it to teach critical thinking skills to my students.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: Without holding anything back, Michael Moore's Bowling for Columbine is provoking, fascinating and a mandatory view.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: A very ballsy, well thought out and overall top-notch documentary on something America is blind to on all sides. Moore did a great job with this one.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: This is a documentary makes good points about violence done by people in America

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: best documentary ive seen in years.

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: Excelente documentário acerca da venda de armas nos EUA e sua relação com os atentados de malucos homicidas!!!

name: bowling_for_columbine
review: Excellent social commentary. Michael doesn't have the answers but at least he's asking the questions.

name: bowling_for_columbine
