review: For all the dreamers, this must be the most inspiring documentary you'll ever get to see. Or at least until we reach and step on Mars. Beautiful, moving ... simply Wow!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: I want to be an astronaut so bad. This movie makes me cry, I'm so proud of America, of humanity, and I am blown away by the magnitude of this historic event. The men who walked on the moon are heros. Those who don't believe need a grave reality check.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Absolutely excellent. Any idiot who thinks it was all a sham, needs to sit, watch, listen and apologize to the brave men of the NASA program.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Es un documental sobre las 24 personas que viajaron a la luna narrado desde sus propias experiencias personales, muy vacana la pelicula. la estan dando en cinemax.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: nicely done and moviing - and I'm no astronaut buff

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Great documentary and companion piece to the book by the same name.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: This documentary is awesome!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: The best film of it's kind to date with a score to match.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: For anyone even remotely interested in space exploration this is an absolute must!!! The men who stood on another world give great insights into the incredible adventure that the Apollo programme was all those years ago!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: When something you've seen dozens of times --- something you LIVED through, for crying out loud --- can make you cry. . . This is good stuff.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: The best documentary on the Apollo program I have ever seen. It was previewed at Goddard last summer and was extremely well-received.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: This was an awesome documentary about the Apollo missions. I am so in love with anything related to the moon, so this was a definite 5 star movie for me!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: The best Apollo Program documentary out there. Does a brilliant job of presenting the humanity of the men involved and the significance of the missions.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Don't miss the extra hour of interviews in the special features.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Absolutely amazing. Still boggles the mind that we were able to do that with 1960s tech.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: beautiful, wonderful movie. I can watch it over and over again

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Awesome documentary! Whether you believe or not it's another look at how awesome our universe is. A reminder that we are petty beings when all is said and done.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Excellent movie. Great footage from actual missions as well as first hand interviews with the actual members from Apollo.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Totally awesome. They don't make men like these anymore.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: An insightful, intimate, moving portrait of the quest to put a man on the moon as told by the men who went there. The style and content really put the magnitude and significance of this time in history into perspective, especially for those of us who did not live through it. Highly recommended.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Absolutely beautiful.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Not only does this movie teach you about the space race, and the Apollo missions but, it also has a very spiritual component to it as the astronauts share how seeing our planet from space moved them and also changed some of their perspectives on life

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: I just adored this film. Mike Collins in particular has a delightful way with words - I totally fell in love with him, and Buzz Aldrin a close second. I can't recommend this one highly enough.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: An inspiring story with tonnes of amazing footage.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: This film is for anyone who thinks Apollo was hoaxed in a movie studio. Remastered contemporary footage mixed with gentle reminiscing by surviving members of one of the planet's most exclusive 'clubs' makes this film a fantastic retrospective on a fantastic enterprise.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: there are few movies I want to own a copy of, this is one. Funny, inspirational, existential...going to the moon changed all these men and gave them a perspective of life on earth that we could learn from.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Excellent documentary of the Apollo missions to the Moon. Even those not interested in space should watch this as it is as much about reflection on ourselves as it is about going to the Moon.Brilliant

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: awesome and inspiring stories of the trips to the moon by real people and the effect it had on their world view, emotional well being and sense of themselves and their connection to the universe.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Excellent movie, really great that they got so many of the actual astronauts to appear.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Very cool documentary ...

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Fantastic documentary featuring some very candid interviews with several of the Apollo astronauts. To me, this film serves as an eloquent answer to the question "Why do we send people into space?"

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Absolutely amazing. Something everyone really needs to see.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Instantly one of my all-time favorite documentaries.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Need some inspiration? Sit down with a handful of real life ultimate bad-asses. Discussion, images, music, all wonderful. You need to see this.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Very good Documentary , I hope one day i can go to the moon

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: A breathtaking, inspiring and powerful film that celebrates the best of humanity. Worthy.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Awesome ..in the truest sense of the word. The greatest unnatural acheivment of the human race!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: A great documentary about the Apollo Missions to the moon. A must see even if you aren't interested in space travel. It will definately keep you interested.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Beautiful movie, great music, nice cinematography, a must see.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Remarkable, moving, and painstakingly detailed.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: I LOVE this movie. I'm just so grateful someone sat down with these incredible men and did a tasteful, unadorned capture of their memories.Plus I want Mike Collins to be my new Uncle Mike and come to all the family reunions. I just love him.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Simply Awesome! just as powerful viewing as Touching The Void, ultra rare interviews with NASA's Apollo Legends!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: One of the best documentaries I've seen.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: I'm such a space nerd! This is great.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Fantastic film - Surviving Apollo Astronauts tell their story accompanied by footage from their mission. A must for anyone interested in space, and I would recommend it to everyone. It looks amazing on the big screen - the closest I'll ever get to walking on the moon.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: One of the most awe inspiring movies I have ever seeen. I am going to do more with my life due to this movie !

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Inspirational and AWESOME!!! Everybody should see this, it is a celebration of mankind. GREAT. The footage alon is worth it...

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: awesome ! didn't believe that a documentary can be as good as this!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Absolutely fantastic. Great visually and the astronauts anecdotes were funny and touching. Loved the connection to a 'higher power'.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Wonderful and inspiring documentary on the surviving astronauts who went to the moon. Worth seeing for some of the characters such as Al Bean, Charlie Duke and especially Mike Collins who almost stole the show. These guys are still true heroes

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: An excellent review of the Apollo moon program.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: I was informed of this movie by the one and only Tom DeLonge, who had only good things to say about it, and I must say he was right. This documentary is amazing! It really does remind you how big a deal it was to land on the moon. There is also a nice message conveyed in the end.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Watching the first moon landing as a kid was fascinating, probably in the same was a new X box game is for this generation. Maybe documentaries like this will give younger generations to pause and consider how amazing it is that we went there, using all that old technology!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: This is such a great movie! It is inspiring and these men were so smart and committed!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Maybe the best documentary about the Apollo program and the moon landings ever made. It's awesome to hear the astronauts themselves tell about the greatest expedition in human history. I hope to live and see a new landing on the moon and a human voyage to Mars and into deep space.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Pretty much any docu about the space program is sure to get me crying at some point, and this one is no exception. Great footage, good interviews. It happened; I was alive at the time and watched as much of it as I was allowed. It was the last time I was proud of us.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: So beautiful, so insightful, so awe-inspiring. Just stunning... though perhaps a tad slow for some (my movie buddy fell asleep).

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: For Apollo nerds like me, pure bliss.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Great movie, who knew Mike Collins was such a comedian? Actually quite funny. And all the old footage - fantastic.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Amazing. Edge of my seat the whole time.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: One of the most lyrically beautiful documentaries I've ever watched.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: wow it a different view of what happened. micheal colloins is simple man

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: One of the best documentaries I've seen in many years... highly recommended... need to buy for my DVD library

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: An exciting and moving documentary, filled with great footage, fascinating information, and - most of all - many of the Apollo astronauts telling amazing stories about what it was like travelling to the moon and back.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: An inspiring documentary that showcases the great things America is capable of, which makes their current image all the more tragic.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Weak. Utterly lacks the poetry and ambiguity of FOR ALL MANKIND, while not really containing any sort of scientific or technological interest either. Interviews with astronauts framed and filmed like bad new-age insurance commercials.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: for so many reasons this film should be seen. so so many reasons. magnificant film making - it will stay with you for a long time.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Outstanding film with footage I have never seen. Definetly the best film I have seen this year, as it looks at the best mankind can achieve!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: best documentary i've ever seen.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Absorbing, inspiring, fascinating and full of great footage. I loved this, and it's a must-see for anyone with an interest in the space program. Highly recommended, this documentary has "the right stuff!"

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: saw this on a plane... what a wonderful discovery... marvellous archive footages... so serene... so human.... it redefines the notion of so-called 'Hero' for me... esp. the guy who is suppose to be at war instead of going to the moon.... Humanity at its best.... one small step for a man....

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: An excellent documentary. Accounts only from the Apollo crews. Neil Armstrong's apprearance was the best.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Excellent documentary on the Apollo missions. Worth every minute and the extra interviews in the bonus material is very interesting too.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Extraordinary, touching documentary on the Apollo 11 moon landing. What sets this one apart is that it is actually told by the astronauts themselves. Plus, no film about the greatest moment in the 20th century ever gets old.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Truly inspiring. You get to see just how brave these guys were, on the knife-edge where fragile technology meets the harshest environment known to man.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: I felt very enlightening euphoria after watching this that will no doubt stay with me.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Very interesting documentary.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Mesmerizing documentary of the Apollo program. Great interviews of the living explorers of our time.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: An amazing look at some of the greatest adventures in American history. Captures perfectly what was Apollo. Anyone who doubts Apollo's authenticity should watch this because then you will know the disservice you are doing to this mean.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Sweet ass! I hear Richard Branson is offering rides into space for $200,000...

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Tremendous film. Amazing footage, much of which I hadn't seen before. I could easily have listened to the Astronauts talk for hours. Such a shame that Neil Armstrong chose not to be involved.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Beautiful documentary, it is amazing what we can do when we put our mind to it. I really enjoyed all the stories that the surviving crew members gave, however I did wish there was more I could have easily watched several more hours.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: brilliant telling of the story of the apollo missions from those involved, and done by a Brit!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: One of the best documentaries I've watched in a long time and one of the best on the space program I've seen.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: A beautifully told history of what may be man's greatest technological achievement to date. Good questions. Excellent answers.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Powerful and wonderfully told by the people who lived it. The original footage is incredible and the stories coming straight from the astronauts make it so much better than any retelling ever could.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Very interesting film and lots of new footage never seen before.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: It was so awesome to see the footage on the big screen. And if you stay through the credits you'll hear the best line ever: "People say we faked the moon landings - why would we fake it NINE TIMES?!"

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: digga denne dokumentaren

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: I loved this film, being 14 when the moon landing occurred, glued to the television. I am very happy they know have a record of the astronauts' personal accounts and memories of that time in history.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: This is a wonderful documentary. Great movie for people interested in NASA and space exploration.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Astounding. Magical. One of the most awe-inspiring moments I've ever experienced in a theater.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Fantastic. Inspiring, funny and surprisingly down-to-earth. Probably the closest you'll get to knowing what it feels like to go into space without actually doing it yourself.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Astronauts. Badass.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Contains footage that I've never seen before (like Deke showing Kennedy the Apollo capsule). Collins was a joy to hear, Bean's enthusiasm was contagious, Cernan's always so cool, and Buzz is the same ol' Buzz... it's brilliant!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: It's very rare that any feature length can hold my undivided attention for the duration, but this managed it with ease ... and then some. In fact, I'm itching to watch it again. I did consider docking half a mark on account of the religious rubbish at the end, but I can overlook that.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: sublime cinema. everyone should be made watch it. reminds you of what faith and purpose in humanity means, encourages bravery and adventurousness while almost inducing a dreamlike coma of awesomeness as you drift through the phenomenal story being told.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Manned space travel & interesting old guys talking about their past. Two of my favorite subjects.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Great documentary about the Apollo missions.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Brilliant. What a smart but humble group of guys.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Incredible. Mike Collins is my new hero--he lit up the screen whenever he was featured.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: One of the best documentaries I've seen. Lots of incredible footage directly from the NASA archives and some great stories from the surviving Apollo astronauts, minus Neil Armstrong. Buzz Aldrin's story about his "first" on the moon is a definite standout.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Amazing and awe-inspiring. Incredible footage to see on the big screen. Touching interviews especially the charismatic Michael Collins. I loved it.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Deeply moving and fascinating.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: An excellent documentary, but even the unseen footage of the Moon does not overshadow the astronauts themselves. Thoughtful, witty and engaging men, and fictional action adventure film-makers should take a look at what real heroes are like. Can't wait for the extended interviews on the DVD !

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: It is breathtaking!!Makes you think if we can stand together!A must see movie!!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Fantastic movie. Properly awesome and very moving. It's still unbelievable what they acheived.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: This documentary had us all spellbound! Whether you were alive during the Apollo missions or not go, and see it.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: A really well done documentary. The astronauts tell a great story. The archive footage is also amazing. A must see film.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Awesome flick. I don't know how someone could watch this and still believe the moon landings were faked.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Best documentary I've ever seen. If you're American, you need to see it.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Interviews in this documentary the astronauts as fun-loving, emotional and very human and astonishing space shots capture the Earth in all its glory. It's an inspiring experience and this documentary provides an unparalleled perspective on the fragile state of our planet

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: EXCELLENT documentary for anyone interested in space exploration. Stunning visuals, interviews with the astronauts themselves and plenty of information on one of humanity's greatest achievements.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Fantastic documentary.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Emotionally powerful v Inspirational Supreme achievement of Mankind

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Incredible documentary of the Apollo missions. Superb commentary from the surviving astronauts, and a lot of images that i'd never seen before.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Amazing film footage. I waited for this movie, like a kid waiting to open presents on Christmas morning, and it delivered amazingly well.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: This is hands down the best Documentary I've seen this year. It's one thing to watch a dramatization of an event, but sitting the the theatre and watching the participants TELL it, intercut with remarkable footage from NASA makes this a moving experience

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Wow... it was so moving, I mean it. Ron Howard is a wonderful director. This is a movie that everyone should see.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Marvelous!!! A must for anyone who enjoyed "From the Earth to the Moon". I would imagine this is as close as we'd get to a description by Magellan-like explorers.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Excellent docudrama! The movie recounts the stories of the real astronauts from the Apollo mission including actual in-person footage! Brilliant!!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Wonderful doc about the Apollo missions told by the astronauts themselves. Fascinating. Go see it.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: wonderful, makes you laugh, but also brings a lump to your throat, you almost feel the adrenalin as the rockets take off. This is no sci-fi this is sci-fact and wonderfully told. GO SEE THIS!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: I need to go to the moon now. This was such a good documentary. I know, still a nerd. But, wow! All of the footage they used was real. It's definitely worth seeing. I promise.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Inspiring. Great music, paired with great footage. The interviews were very enlightening and were the closest things to ever making me want to become an astronaut. Of course, I'd have a heart attack on the way up and die, but still... wonderful movie.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Fab footage of the moon missions. Really cool interviews with the astronauts make it very personal. Even if you're not a space junkie, you will be after this great doc.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: It was unbelievable. I loved listening to the actual astronauts and their stories. I took my space-loving six year old and both of us thought it was great!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Currently hard to find, but a great documentary. Even if it doesn't have special effects :)

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: excellent. sad to see how much we could accomplish at one time and compare it to now.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: pretty schweet documentary

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: An amazing documentary. It was extremely moving, beautifully scored and a prime example of excellent editing. I hope this movie gets awarded.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Great documentary! Go see it!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Christ on a pogo stick! Man walks on the fucking moon! For reals!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: I drove to Indy to see this. WELL worth it, some of the most awe inspiring footage I have ever seen. I recommend it to everyone.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: this film will take your breath away.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Excellent documentary. Brought a lot of details about an important American event that I knew relatively little about.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: A documentary of the 12 astronauts who landed on the moon. Through science and their pursuit of knowledge via experimentation and trial and error.. they experience God.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: This film is one of the most awe-inspiring experiences you will ever have as a human being. It is the best documentary film I have ever seen.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: This is an extraordinary movie, though perhaps what makes it extraordinary is the subject rather than the moviemaking itself. It's still an absolute must-see, particularly on the big screen.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: great documentary, great footage, great everything.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: This really adds a human touch to of the men who have been there.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: I will never complain about rain again!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: This movie was FANTASTIC. Lots of archival footage I'd never seen before, and candid interviews with many of the Apollo astronauts. Beautiful score as well. If you have the chance, go!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: An awe inspiring doc. This stunning capture of America provides a perspective to a time that changed the world forever.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: In this simple yet brilliant film, the surviving Apollo astronauts personally describe their role in one of the greatest achievements of the 20th century. A reminder of what a colossal and heroic effort it took to put human beings on the moon.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Loved it. Awe-inspiring movie. Certainly not for everyone, but for me, one of the best. Like a story told by your grandfather. Very inspiring!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: I'm a space nut and a total sucker for this stuff!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Stunning capture of the stories of the moon landings by the astronauts themselves. An amazing, inspiring film. And loved the quote at the end addressing consipiracy theories, â??If we faked it, why did we fake it nine times?" ;-)

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Beautiful film... some gorgeous shots.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Excellent movie, experience the Apollo days. Buzz Aldrin is surprisingly funny.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Loved it. Need to be reminded every once in awhile about what we are capable of. It was an amazing time where the world was united as one.

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: WOW! I'm actually speechless. This movie was AMAZING. I teared up in more than one part. Words cannot express how much this movie touched me emotionally. Gene Cernan said it best "Too much purpose, to much logic, to beautiful to have happened by accident."

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon
review: Fantastic documentary! The archival footage from NASA is wonderful, and the interviews really get the human side of the astronauts of the Apollo program. Highly recommended!!

name: 1174399-in_the_shadow_of_the_moon

name: waltz_with_bashir
review: A potent story with mesmerizing visuals.

name: waltz_with_bashir
review: Impossible to forget and gripping.

name: waltz_with_bashir
review: A horrific story of our recent history coming from Lebanon as remembered by a group of Israeli soldiers. Very well made animation documentary as the film maker travels ,trying to fill gaps in his memory of the horrid massacre in Beirut. Extremely well made but sad

name: waltz_with_bashir

name: waltz_with_bashir

name: waltz_with_bashir
review: This is fantastic, so original, so good at making you emote with the subject, well done indeed.

name: waltz_with_bashir
review: This film is haunting, harrowing, and perfect. You're sucked so deep into the fantasy world that you forget it's all entirely real - which is exactly the point. When the credits rolled, nobody moved, nobody spoke.

name: waltz_with_bashir
review: Moving, terrifying, and depressing all at the same time. The animation perfectly captured the atrocities of war.

name: waltz_with_bashir
review: Extremely impressive, fascinating and enlightening about the difficult scenarios in the Middle East in the 80's. Highly recommended.

name: waltz_with_bashir
review: A hypnotic dance with death that delivers an emotional wallop and a potent anti-war message.It's a fearless and unblinking march into the heart of one man's darkness and the pain and anguish of generations and nations.A powerfully ambiguous meditation on personal and collective avoidance.

name: waltz_with_bashir
review: Being totally ignorant of the war in Beirut, i found this very difficult to get into. The style of animation was positively unuusual but still only gave it 10 minutes. Were i to brush up on this particular piece of history i might enjoy it to the end

name: waltz_with_bashir
review: Annimated documentary

name: waltz_with_bashir

name: waltz_with_bashir
review: A breakthrough in animation which uses some impressive digital animation with documentary storytelling. The result? One of the most potent discussions of war ever put to film.

name: waltz_with_bashir
review: Unlike anything you'll ever see. A fusion of animation and documentary about the horror of war, and memory's place in human life. You learn about both, and its animation is some of the best I've ever seen.

name: waltz_with_bashir

name: waltz_with_bashir
review: Absolutely stunning. A must see.

name: waltz_with_bashir

name: waltz_with_bashir

name: war_tapes
review: Possibly the most compelling work made on the Iraq War, it defies any partisan criticism. It's neither an indictment of the war or an affirmation of it, even as its subjects openly express their thoughts and frustrations. Instead it offers a thorough portrait marked by striking ambiguity.

name: man_on_wire

name: man_on_wire

name: man_on_wire
review: Worst movie of all time and also the worst acting of all time. I couldn't understand a word he was saying and he made the mistake of talking to the camera,every good actor knows not to look at the camera. don't waste your time with this shite, he dosen't even fall off at the end.

name: man_on_wire
review: A fantastic film that turns a circus act into a mind-bending heist-like film. Inspiring and an attempt to bring back the glory of the twin towers from the symbol of terrorism that it has become since 9/11. Man on Wire is all you can ever ask from a documentary film and more.

name: man_on_wire
review: A brilliant documentary that brings suspense throughout. It's flawless.10 out of 10

name: man_on_wire
review: A brilliant documentary that brings suspense throughout. It's flawless.  10 out of 10

name: man_on_wire
review: What a fantastic and absolutely flawless film. The story is amazing, the delivery is brilliant, the way it's shot is superb. Watch this movie and be captivated by it's beauty.

name: man_on_wire

name: man_on_wire

name: man_on_wire

name: man_on_wire

name: bright_lights_starring_carrie_fisher_and_debbie_reynolds
review: A beautiful tribute to Carrie Fisher and Debbie Reynolds who were undoubtedly two of the most talented stars in Hollywood. As always Carrie is eccentric, wise, funny and whipsmart with some particularly memorable moments. If you're a Carrie Fisher or Debbie Reynolds fan and miss them, this helps.

name: bright_lights_starring_carrie_fisher_and_debbie_reynolds
review: So glad the product placement wasn't distracting.

name: bright_lights_starring_carrie_fisher_and_debbie_reynolds
review: Heartbreaking, funny, painfully honest, crude, entertaining, tragic. Love it. Need a tissue.

name: bright_lights_starring_carrie_fisher_and_debbie_reynolds
review: Watching this documentary you really get to know Debbie Reynolds and Carrie Fisher. Beautiful seeing their relationship. You can see how close they are in the end and how worried Carrie was for her mum. Interesting knowing all the history I never knew.

name: bright_lights_starring_carrie_fisher_and_debbie_reynolds
review: Fantastic documentary, after watching this, it is obvious why Debbie and Carrie died within a day of each other.

review: it was a very poignant, honest look at the lives of two ladies who forever impacted the entertainment industry. This little gem of a movie is a terrific tribute to them and a wonderful way to remember them. May their starts shine on forever.

name: bright_lights_starring_carrie_fisher_and_debbie_reynolds
review: A wonderful doc about Debbie Reynolds and Carrie Fisher. It was great learning more about their family history.

Held in detention for several weeks, he is now under constant watch by the government. His courage to defend freedom of expression is as inspiring as his art.

name: enron_the_smartest_guys_in_the_room
review: A documemtary of epic proportions. The eerie feeling it leaves you with lingers for a while. The curiosity it sparks in you will lead you through an intellectual discussion with yourself.

name: enron_the_smartest_guys_in_the_room
review: Brilliant expose of how, abled by Bush and other Republican scum, Enron robbed and expolited Californians.

name: enron_the_smartest_guys_in_the_room

name: enron_the_smartest_guys_in_the_room
review: I wish people would watch more of these financial documentaries to see how we were had and continue to be had to this day.

name: enron_the_smartest_guys_in_the_room
review: Nice documentary about the story of ENRON's chiefs.

name: enron_the_smartest_guys_in_the_room
review: It explains why Sarbanes-Oxley was born.

name: enron_the_smartest_guys_in_the_room
review: A must watch film showing how shallow most of the corporations are in the world. This is why the stock market should be regulated and futures need to be stopped. This is the sort of film that everyone should watch just to get a grasp on how to see it coming before it comes.

name: enron_the_smartest_guys_in_the_room
review: Extremely sensationalist, but thats what makes it fun to watch

name: enron_the_smartest_guys_in_the_room
review: Highly educational and puts such a complex matter into terms the common man can understand. You can read further into the scandal by watching this DVD as opposed to trying to follow it in the papers. Lays it out beautifully.

name: enron_the_smartest_guys_in_the_room
review: The best documentary I have seen to date! I had no idea how deep the Enron corruption ran. Enron had involvements in everything from the 2001 rolling blackouts in California to California's wildfires to even the demise of Blockbuster Video. Watch this movie!

name: enron_the_smartest_guys_in_the_room
review: A classic example of how Capitalism is nothing but a con game and anyone who believes in it blindly is one of the suckers born every minute.

name: enron_the_smartest_guys_in_the_room

name: enron_the_smartest_guys_in_the_room
review: I am addicted to this Doc. It is very well explained

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: I've seen a ton of Cobain docs but this is by far the best. the animation combined with the style of how this documentary was shot is fantastic.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Wow, he was seriously doomed from the beginning. Really powerful and essentially in his own words albeit cut together to make a specific statement but still ... Just really sad.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Full of unreleased music, art and tapes from the Nirvana lead with a perfect pace that makes perfect use of the group songs, Montage of Heck is the definitive Kurt Cobain documentary that will satisfy fans of the musician and someone looking for a good documentary all the same

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Really enjoyed this, seeing all the home footage, and the way they mixed on his writing and art. Well done and shows more insight into who he really was.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Not only the best music based documentary I have ever seen, but one of the best documentary films I have seen, period.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: An amazing look at Kurt Cobain's life and legacy.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: shows him as a human being. not a "voice of a generation" My hero

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: shows him as a human being. not a "voice of a generation" My hero

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Sensível, humano, nada hagiográfico, nada apelativo, bem ilustrado, nunca é chato, bem pesquisado, com foco e direcionamento específico. Enfim... um documentário biográfico perfeito. Thumbs up, Brett Morgen.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: A stunning portrait a tortured, brilliant and at times conflicted artist who struggled (or so it seemed) with fame. The animated sequences are breathtaking and direction overall was as intimate as one can get. This is one of this years best films!

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Certainly doesn't glorify Cobain but rather tells an intimate story of who he really was. Excellent.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Movie of the year so far for me.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Beautifully made. This is a movie not a rockumentary. The cutaways to animation with the cover tracks. Kurt's own voice speaking. Listening to Nirvana's music again. So much pain and sadness in the background. RIP Kurt.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: A truly amazing documentary about the late great Nirvana front man. My only complaint would be that, Dave Grohl's interviews couldn't be included. So, fingers crossed they get added in for a DVD release.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Fucking Awesome Rockumentary ???

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: One of the best documentaries in years, this perfectly captivates the insanity, craziness, but most of all artistic genius of Kurt Cobain.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: A must see movie ..for all Kurt's fans

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: A great insight into a very sad music legend!

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: I can't stop thinking about how great this doc was.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: This is one of the absolute best documentaries I've ever seen!!

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: A beautifully morbid and jarring roller coaster of a documentary. Surprisingly dark and gothic at moments, and tear jerking at others. Courtney has finally done some justice with her involvement here. We all wanted to see Dave though ;)

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Whether or not you're a Nirvana fan, I highly highly recommend Montage of Heck. Its absolutely riveting from start to finish.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: This was so greatly put together... it was like looking through the world in his eyes because of all the raw material that was used directly from the source. His legacy in music is timeless and will forever carry on.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: awesome on so many levels..

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: I don't review movies much anymore, but this is enough to possibly revert me back to homeostasis without even being fiction.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: A must for any child of the 80s. Strap in.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: I wish somebody would animate my teenage notebooks full of weird drawings and shitty poetry, How Cool!!

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: A great humanizing look into quite possibly the last artist to shape music and speak to an entire generation.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Very aptly named documentary. Such a force of a documentary that I couldn't take my eyes off of it. There is also a melancholy tone set through almost all of it that it made you see KC in a MUCH different light. Think it's time to go back through my Nirvana discography and listen more intently.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: On a different level than most other things.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Very interesting look at the MAN that was Kurt Cobain. Loved how the focus was on him and not Nirvana or his death! Well done. Disturbing and raw at times. A must for any fan!

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Really good. Really dark. Must watch again soon.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Totally blown away by KURT COBAIN: MONTAGE OF HECK. The best doc I have seen in years and that rare film whose style and format is totally in keeping with the spirit of its subject. You feel immersed. You understand. You see what's important in all new ways. A staggering achievement!

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Wonderful. Spectacular. He was a beautiful, talented musician, artist and person who struggled with things we can all relate to in our own lives. All of us.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: A frenetic, fascinating sprint through Cobain's life that never gets lost in its maker's clearly abiding love for the man and his music. An uncensored look at what made -- and unmade -- Cobain.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: The footage in this rockumentary will haunt you.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: So incredibly haunting. A beautiful yet difficult tribute from his daughter.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Love this biopic, well done and i love the animation too

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: This... this was very good.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Just finished watching this film. Really good. Kurt will be missed. You think that it's another film about his legacy. This is about his struggles with his life, his band, and his family. This is dark, gritty, and totally messed up. Gonna get it on Blu-Ray for sure.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Kurt Cobain: Montage Of Heck is easily a masterpiece of documentary film making. This film was more about the man and less about the band. A must watch for any Nirvana fan.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Sterile, disengaged, heartless vanity piece.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: This film was well done.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Half decent documentary but the music is dreadful and so painfull to listen to, he really couldn't sing. Don't understand why he was so famous

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: A must-see for any Nirvana fan

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: I am a Nirvana fan, my wife hates Nirvana. We both loved Montage of Heck.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Very insightful look at the inner workings of Kurt Cobain, childhood Ritalin and a life addicted to heroin. Well directed, a must see!

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: A ridiculous memento mori of an overhyped musician, who did his best to kill the music that made him famous. The only reason why this film exists, is because he made the smart career move of dying before his 15 minutes were up.

name: kurt_cobain_montage_of_heck_2015
review: Nice to see a documentary about his life and not his death.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: I love Banksy, si Yeah I love this movie and I give it 5 stars 100%!...

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: First part was fascinating, second part endearing. All in all, Banksy, Theirry, and the filmmakers have created beautiful art.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Joke of a movie starts out with promise then you realize you were simply being trolled by whom ever actually created the film. They basically tell you how dumb the public is when it comes to art.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Loved this weirdness. At once confusing, amazed at the stupidity of consumers, irritated with Banksy, laughed at Thierry, duped, tricked and played, all in the name of great entertainment!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: This was really funny and really interesting.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: We've all been myster brain washed.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Que história inusitada e surpreendente. Talvez Banksy devesse tentar uma carreira paralela como documentarista.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: One of the best mockumentary films I've seen. It combines humor, wit, and an adept cast to tell the story of street artists.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Embodying all the edge and mystery of street art, Exit Through the Gift Shop is an acerbic and subversive commentary on the nature of inspiration, originality, and the reflexive nature between object and subject.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Wildly funny and almost unbelievable.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Its awesome, funny, and interesting as hell.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Love this one!! One of my favorites!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: this was hands down the best and most interesting documentatary ive seen in a long time. just a crazy story all the way through and really makes you think about art is all about and why some pieces are complete junk and others are worth millions.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: It was fun to watch and thought-provoking at the same time.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: This has to be my favorite movie of 2010. Far out and ridiculously hilarious, this documentary captures a part of this world we have never seen before. We are living in a new wave revolution of art and did not even know! Or is this new wave just a hoax?

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: This movie is FANTASTIC. A truly amazing look at street art from one of the masters. He's cocky, he's critical, but Banksy is a true artistic genius. His apprentice Thierry Guetta on the other hand is an absolute riot. Really funny, clever and heartfelt.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: love street/graffiti art

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: These arts that go underhand are simply pleasurable. Such great upshot out of great provocation.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: One of the greatest movies of our generation.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Awesome documentary on Banksy

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: I love art. I hated this. zzzzzzzz

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: I had no idea this would be so absolutely hilarious

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: I don't know how much of it is real, but it's an entertaining story.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Best documentary I have seen all year!!! Wow, what a great film, you have no clue where this movie is going to take you until you get there. Well worth tracking down and watching. I won't tell you too much, but it is a movie about street artists, at least that is how it starts out.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Banksy delivers a message, a message left to the audience to interpret for themselves. Delivery is as mysterious and entertaining as ever. Banksy wins with his subtle, hilarious statement about the arts lol

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Incredible. Underground graffiti art documentary directed by the greatest graffiti artist in the world? Um, yes. 5/5

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: A wonderful documentary that is very entertaining and incredibly interesting.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: I love how a Banksy documentary gets turned on the camera man!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: "Exit" is an amazing look into one of the greatest forces of contemporary art as well as an often amusing and unique biography--or story--depending on whether you think it's real or fake. Either way, "Exit"'s worth a watch.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Its study of street-art/artists is both engrossing and humorous, but what makes Exit Through The Gift Shop so memorable is its ability to show the depth and personality behind the artists, as well as the reasons why they do what they do.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Finally watched it in full last night - it was hilarious!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Real or not doesn't matter. It's a riveting and hilarious piece of art!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Brilliant work from Banksy.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Astoundingly fascinating. For the uninitiated of the world of street art this movie is a bizarre glimpse in to a usually mysterious and secluded world.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Really wild and well done documentary. Edgy and amazing.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Second favorite film of 2010, one of my favorite docs.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Exit Through The Gift Shop is a stunning documentary with charm and wit that examines the commoditisation of the art industry with key perspectives and the hand of no other than that or mastermind Banksy himself. It's definetely one of the finest documentaries ever made and it is even inspiring.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: This is officially one of the best documentaries film to date. Provocative and funny. yet it explores the secret underground of street art. Banksy, i really adore your artworks. And this film trully makes him one of the most talented person on earth.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: one of the best made documentaries I've ever seen, its funny, Its political and the soundtrack is catchy as hell. If you like art then you'll love this film. 10/10

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: The best!!!! Both an awesome chronicle of the underground world of street art, and a powerful critique of the art consumption behavior in America as related to media.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Genius at work. Just like Banksy and his entire street art collection, this documentary is open to interpretation. Love him or loath him, this insight is possibly the closest we may ever get to knowing the real Banksy.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: brilliant. absolutely didnt expect the second half of the film!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: brilliant proves art critics are idiots

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Ohh if you're not watching this film, you're truly missing out on so much.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Great movie about street art

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Loved this... I've always wondered about what makes art 'art'/.. This film explores that well.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: An excellent documentary, bringing the audience into the world behind the spray can.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: A fascinating piece of work that has you questioning the value of "art".

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Really original and wonderfully thought provoking.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: This documentary wasted roughly 86 precious minutes of my life, similarly to how people wasted millions of dollars on Thierry Guetta's "art."

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Um rapaz sem talento se torna um artista famoso na rabeira da confusão gerada pelo street art. Uma crítica mordaz à falta de critério para a apreciação artística nos dias de hoje.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: An excellent doc...uh...mock...ah... FILM. Informative about the street artist process and funny to boot!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: A bold and important documentary. Delving into a prejudiced world where nothing is as it seems.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: All you need to know about banksy

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Obscurity for its own sake.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Great documentary! Loved it, I feel like Banksy tricked me by the end.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Brilliant little documentary about street art and its struggle to remain subversive in the face of marketability and hype. Very fascinating and totally immersive.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: This is such a great an entertaining film!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: .. Money & hype can make art cheap... Creating art and new ideas without needing to make money or attract hype does not makes sense to the business world, but it makes sense to an artist..

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Whatever the truth is, ultimately, this 'documentary' was disappointing. And a bit boring too.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: On my shortlist of best documentaries of all time.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: I finally saw this - can't believe it took this long! It was great!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Banksy is pure genius!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Fascinating view of street art

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: One of the most exciting documentaries in years.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: quite simply, the greatest documentary about art ever. ever. ever. fantastically thought provoking. must see.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: one of 2010's best film. funny and slightly tragic. Banksy should have won.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: There's so much I want to say about this... I don't even know where to begin.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: A ocasião faz o ladrão.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Who knows if Mr Brainwash is real or not, but this movie has more twists and turns than any documentary I've seen in a long time. Entirely original, wholly engrossing and a super-close look at modern street art as told by the most recognized figure in that world, Banksy. A fun, interesting movie!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Immensely funny and intriguing. The fact that Mr. Brainwash maybe fake makes it so much more engrossing.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: MBW?Mr.Brain Wash) is a really crazy french man, but his works have made plenty of money .Nobody knows what is true and what is not , what is an art?and what isn't.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: This is a really cool film! Interesting, funny, real or not?

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Waiting for something to happen the entire movie, turns out its just another terribly painful documentary. Please don't waste your time as I did.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: If you're famous you can sell random shit for thousands of dollars

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: a MUST-Watch... great documentary

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: I just watched this again and just realized the Kinko's in Hollywood on Vine St. where I go to make things is the same one Thierry filmed Shepard Fairey at in this documentary. He obviously left graffiti art vibes in there to inspire others.. :) I LOVE LA!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Getting a little obsessed with Banksy and this documentary doesn't tell you much about the man of mystery, the DVD extra B Movie tells you a little more though. Other than that I have pretty conflicted views on Mr Brain Wash!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Banksy's street art is really great but this is a shitty movie.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: If you love street art - this is a must see

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Amusing while it exposes the falsehoods and propaganda concerning its themes, Exit Through the Gift Shop is a funny, absorbing glimpse of covert art.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: where has this movie been all my life? WATCH IT! ON NETFLIX!!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: As far as docs go, this one does it all for me. Entertaining and informative. I love documentaries!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: This is truly amazing movie. I am totally not sure if it is a documentary or just a big joke. I even did some googling, to figure it out. Either way it is a great movie.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: A fun look at graffitists and street artists, spotlighting on a few of the more famous. Funny, interesting and not too long so as to be boring, it's a good look at how street art became popular.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: I'm convinced that this is all a hoax. Haven't stopped thinking about the brilliance of Banksy since I watched this film. I now collect Brainwash art because I know it is Banksy in sheeps clothes.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Finally watched this!! And I was quite surprised! It wasn't what I expected. Left me quite intrigued with the beginnings of this "art underworld" so to speak.I hope there are more such doccies to come! Plus it was funny :) Loved it.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Really loves this doc. It was so interesting, and I really wonder about all the conspiracy theories behind it.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Not sure if serious...part of the attraction...totally different, totally mysterious, yet totally engaging...

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: An awesome documentary. It's truly a work of art in of itself. It gives an in-depth looks at the goings on in the underground art scene and how it, quite frankly, isn't so underground anymore.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: The most hilarious and absurd documentary I have ever seen. The two of us LOVED it!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Made me feel used. Screw you Banksy.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Just watch the movie, just do it. I don't care if you have plans you have new plans now. This was the movie that got me into street art. It's why I go out posting gabe newells across town. I love this movie

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Everyone will hear about it now that it's been nominated for Best Doc at the academy awards. As a big fan of documentaries, this is one of the most ingenious, creative and madly brilliant docs I've seen. Plus gives the viewer great insight on the fantastic street artists that are out there.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Exit Through the Gift Shop is amazingly well directed. It doesn't feel hyped, it doesn't seem to lie or exaggerate the happenings and the fact that an interesting, motivated and special character gets to portrait everything from an outside view is fascinating to watch.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Whether this is a trick by Banksy or an actual portrayal, this film is amazing. If you declare yourself an artist you owe it to yourself to watch this.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: One of my all time surprise favorite movies.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: An amazing documentary. Well made. I loved it.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: It had,me and the missus having a great discussion after it.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Great movie, I am a big fan of street art

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Really impressed by this movie. Too bad the subject becomes really unlikeable by the end of the film...

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Not so much meta fiction as it's meta meta meta fiction.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Really great movie, I guess art isn't so mysterious after all.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Very entertaining documentary. It's on Hulu plus and on Instant Netflix. Take 86 minutes and watch it.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Any fan of graffiti should check this out, some of our generations best artists are part of this movie.

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: One of the craziest and coolest docs ever made. A wild ride!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: Fascinating, inspiring and entertaining. This flick opens up the world of the street artist and tells a story leading to the simultaneous mainstream rejection and purchase of the street art. Layered in is a story of mr brainwash that is some say is itself a work of art. Loved it!

name: exit_through_the_gift_shop
review: This documentary, has been one of my favorite documentaries . This has made me fond of the street-art and to learn more about it. Documentary gets clearer transcending from love of filming to street-art. Wonderful I really enjoyed this.

Eye opening and disturbing.

review: Get to know people in this country who are struggling and others who are working so hard to help them. It's so incredible. These people will stay with you.

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: A powerful, difficult, timely documentary about gang violence and nonviolence in embattled Chicago.

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: One of the best documentaries I have ever watched. You will be moved watching the ground war of those struggling against the marginalization of entire populations. Its visceral, yet understated elegance demands viewing.

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: A shame this film got dubbed by the Academy. Sobering and heartfelt and even humorous despite its grim subject matter, the Interrupters manages to convey an amazing amount of hope. Important both as art and social commentary. A tad bit long, but I don't hold that against it.

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: Yo le doy una estrella mas. Casi nunca veo problemas realmente solucionados que presentan los documentales. Aqui los vi con mis propios ojos. Problema y solucion de la mano.

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: Incredible documentary.

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: One of the reasons that I am proud to call myself a Chicagoan is because Steve James lives here. HOOP DREAMS and now THE INTERRUPTERS teach us not only about the documentary form but also how we can be better humans. I can only hope Mr. James continues to splice our lives on the big screen.

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: Documentary about Ceasefire working to stop violence in Chicago neighborhoods. Very personal stories of the intervenors, who themselves served time for murder or other violent crimes, and how they work in the community to break the violence disease.

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: powerful, important movie!

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: this film about inner city violence in chicago can have an effect on anyone

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: A movie everyone needs to see. The best film of 2011 so far.

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: Intense & important.

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: how on earth can anybody come up with something as beautiful as this?

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: looks like nice film like hoop dreams

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: One of the best documentary films of 2011. Directed by Steve James (Hoop Dreams).

name: the_interrupters_2011
review: Required viewing. Simple as that.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: A masterful closer look into the consequences of China booming economy.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Think twice before buying something made in China.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Insightful documentary of migrant workers in China.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Amazing work. It take you right into the merciless changes happening in China, sweeping any concept of graduality you may have. This country, as in the many "countries" that integrate it, are defying our standards every single day, for good and for bad, it is just happening.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: A documentary that is like a feature film! Amazing!

name: last_train_home-2009
review: This documentary was heart wrenching and eye opening. Crazy how easy life is here in the states compared to China.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Sobering, harrowing, and ultimately realistic with none of the usual preachy-ness that comes with most documentaries.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: This is an amazing film! You can see how different the life would be if you were in this girl's situation. Everyone has a different life though. This is completely unfamiliar to me as I only know about China as a tourist!!

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Absolutely incredible.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Best Documentary film I have seen.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: 100% at Rotten Tomatoes <3Powerful and fascinating drama documentary.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Frightening and depressing documentary on the millions of poor workers in China. If you think your life is shit - watch this.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Last Train Home will tug at your heartstrings as it opens your eyes, but it also will make you feel incredibly lucky and more than a little spoiled.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: I do not have the ability to properly write a review for this one. Five stars.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Documentary in the truest sense of the word. A combination of beautiful cinematography and the pure struggle that migrant workers have to go through make this one of the best portrayals of who supports global consumerism.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Don't know what possessed me to watch this documentary. I must have too much joy in my life. It was absolutely crushing.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Fantastic movie, really intense experience, so different from what our lucky western civilization is used to.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Great film, check it out...

name: last_train_home-2009
review: When it comes to pure, raw emotions on display for all of us to see this documentary goes through the roof. If you think arriving 3 hours before your flight to go through TSA inspection is rough, after seeing this you will NEVER complain again.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Amazing life of the other half of China, away from its superficial glitz and bling!

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Wow.. still sucking it all in.Four instantly lovable people barely stand each other in a dysfunctional family, with the stress of poverty, the hardship of making ends meet every day tears them apart even more.This is the heartbreaking story of modern China.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: honestly this documentary was so fantastic, I can barely describe it. Just...mind blowing.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Last Train Home will tug at your heartstrings as it opens your eyes, but it also will make you feel incredibly lucky and more than a little spoiled.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: This is a great great documentary. Something that will stay with you long after watching it . In DVD February 22.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: This movie makes me feel guilty that I live in the United States

name: last_train_home-2009
review: glad i dont live in china

name: last_train_home-2009
review: An amazing look at the people who make our affordable luxuries.

name: last_train_home-2009
review: Yes, you see right, a five star. I haven't given any five stars out to a movie in a year. It is a well done documentary that makes you think about the products you buy and who makes them and the journey they make just to have a job to make our products.

review: Essential viewing for understanding the real costs or Chinas recent embrace of capitalism. I promise you will never be able to buy anything "made in China" without seeing this young girl's face in your dreams- or nightmares as the case may be. A must see.
